name: _Autonation
description:
Greetings Hacker,

Simple job. Just like the others.

Get in, find the server room, steal the data,  get out.

STAY OUT OF THE LIGHT

*********************************************************************

_AUTONATION is a first person stealth/exploration game about stealing sensitive data from a large corporation in a retro-futuristic world where humans have abandoned any type of manual labor in favor of automation and remote control.

You play as yourself. 

You're using this program to remote control a taser wielding CRT monitor on wheels in a far away city for an unknown employer who may or may not be motivated by corporate espionage.

It's all unclear.

*********************************************************************

This is my first completed game and was started this year to practice game design, 3D modeling, coding etc. In saying that there are still bugs that need to be ironed out in a 1.01 patch. But in the meantime here it in glorious jank.
